name: easyShare
author: st3ph

sections.description:
easyShare is a plugin to share your content with friends, social networks etc …
It is fully customizable : icons path, position, display mode, bloc title, bookmark text, custom css and class, servies to display.
And yeah, there is a “test mode” in the options to configure your plugin when you edit your posts

Arbitrary section

A brief Markdown Example

  • Share all your content on 23 services (facebook, reddit, twitter, StumbleUpon, FriendFeed, del.icio.us, digg …)
  • 2 nice display mode
  • Customizable css, icons, services, titles …

  • Can be display on posts, pages or both
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Optionnal, enable the “test mode” to configure your plugin easily
sections.faq:
Can i add more services ?

Not right now, probably in a next version (or via suggestions)
